roleset.name: to shout, yell
roleset.note: HOLLER-V NOTES: Frames file for 'holler' based on survey of sentences in the WSJ corpus. (from holler.01-v predicate notes)

example.name: intransitive
example.text: When it was n't my turn in the balloon [*T*-2] I followed its progress from the `` chase car , '' [*-1]listening to the driver holler into a walkie-talkie .
